#summary Client commands

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =

The client commands are commands that are typed in the player consoles. Typically, you'll bind a key to `cssmatch` :
{{{
bind e cssmatch
}}}


= Commands Description =
----
==cssmatch==
This command allow the referees to access the admin menu.

----
==cssm_rates==
This command displays into the user console the value of *cl_updaterate*, *cl_cmdrate*, *cl_interp* et *rate* for each player connected. These values could be enforced by the server.

----
